Name: Christian Brothers, Oceania Support Centre – NSW and ACT

About.Access: Varies according to series and needs of researcher. Please contact the archivist. Proof of identity may be required.

About.Acquisition focus: Internal documents related to the operation of the Christian Brothers in Australasian Province from the 1880’s. Also records that relate to the former St Mary’s Province New South Wales 1953-2007.

About.Major holdings:
Brothers’ Communities documents
	Correspondence of the Provincial Leader and his Council
	Province Chapters
	Photographs and plans
	Christian Brothers textbooks and publications

About.See also:
Christian Brothers – St Francis Xavier Province
